                                   +----Editor.Ed
public class Ed
extends Frame

Ed(Statechart, String, int, int, int, int)
Generates a drawframe
  • root : handle of Statechart
  • name : windowname
  • top : top windowposition
  • left : left windowposition
  • width : window width
  • height : window height
Ed(String)
Generates a menuframe
  • name : windowname

Ed()
This Method returns the current Drawmode of the WindowMenu
ListenEditor()
This Method returns the status of the update-Listener
SetListen()
This Method turns the update-Listener to true (only for Editor-Events)
